statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[33m[%s]\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_branch"
